author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Extend testing of the V16/V17 geometry versions of HGCal. These tests are not expected to produce changes in any existing scenarios

#### PR validation:

Use these testing tools to make more elaborate tests of HGCal geometries (V17 and V16)

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx335C Extend testing of the V16/V17 geometry versions of HGCal
